comments: Phases 1 & 2 of PPB Parliament Precinct Branch project are included in KPMG original Price Proposal. Following the completion of Phase 1  Mar 31, 2014, Phase 2 Tasks identified in the Scope of Work at the same conditions and at the same prices stated in the Contract are exercised in the Call Up Amendment 003. The value is to deliver the scope of work for Phases 2 A &2 B in KPMG's 2013-07-12 Proposal and identified in the Contract . This multi year contract is a Call Up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada. This contract includes one or more amendments.
